data.text: @Maza83 Hello, apologies for the delayed response. To help you in the best possible way, we need please sent to us via DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the person traveling. We will be waiting your response. Greetings.
@anacapecod Hello, we just left a DM. Regards.
@valeliese Hola, te enviamos un DM. Saludos.

@Mariana41956682 Hello. Please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@AngelaGuevara21 Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@Naory Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.

One more step towards inclusivity! At LATAM Airlines we want everyone to be able to fly, which is why we have started a certification process to assist passengers on the autism spectrum. Giving wings to inclusivity. #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/ZbEAoFAPuJ https://t.co/aa496A9hk7
@toledofernanda Fernanda, we had sent you a private message

@marqimiliano Please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.

@marinagibson25 Hi, please send us via DM your airport report number, along with your booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@anacapecod Hi, since your ticket is still under the agency control, you must get in touch with them to process it. You can get more information by entering the following link: https://t.co/JOIDBb6idk / Shopping at travel agencies or other places. We appreciate your understanding. Regards.

@VaniaMiamiRio Hello, apologies for the delayed response. To assist you in the best way, please tell us via DM, your full name, ticket number, document number (DNI, ID or RUT), Bag Tag (suitcase label) and PIR (airport claim number). We are looking forward to your response. Kind regards.

@toledofernanda Hello; to verify the information of your request, via DM, please send us the reservation code (6 letters) and / or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passengers. We look forward to your comments. Greetings.
@fvigeland Hello, we have provided a response via DM. Kind regards.

@gabeusse Hello, apologies for the delayed response time. To verify the information of your request, via DM, send us the reservation code (6 letters) and / or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passengers. We look forward to your comments. Greetings.
@JTGenter Hello, we've sent you a DM.

@alejogcl Hello. In order to assist you with your request, please provide us with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name via DM. We will be waiting for your reply.
@Ludelbon Hola, te hemos contestado vía DM. Saludos.

@zizz101 Hello, we encourage you to submit your concerns about your experience with us in the following link: https://t.co/xrIMfMjr7M, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service in case of been necessary. Regards.
@Naory Hi, we have responded to your request via DM. Regards.

@eitanblanche Hi, we recommend for you to communicate directly with our baggage department here: https://t.co/EOcBXDzpc3, or through our contact center: https://t.co/tm7PqQXCVg, and request for your call to be transferred to them, so they can assist you with your claim. Best regards.

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @VaniaMiamiRio Hi, we would recommend for you to communicate directly with our baggage department through here: https://t.co/zqAuE5wdqr, or through our contact center: https://t.co/OWvyqnysWI, and request for your call to be transferred to them, so they can assist you with your claim. Regards.

@israelnahuelan Por favor envíanos por DM (mensaje directo), los siguientes datos: Código de reserva (6 letras) o el número del ticket (13 dígitos) y el nombre y apellido del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.

@lorryn9 Hi, passengers who had COVID and are recovered, may travel presenting the certificate of the positive test, of no more than 90 days of being issued, together with the medical discharge issued by the treating physician, to enter the USA. Regards.

data.text: @phoenixfarrah Hi, we have sent a response via DM. Regards.
@kristellebatu Hola, con el fin de brindarte asistencia, es necesario que nos indiques más detalles de tu solicitud vía DM. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@Sofirama Hola, con el fin de poderte asistir por favor envianos vía DM tu código de reserva y nombre completo del pasajero que esta en la reserva. Saludos.
@klustart18 Hola, por seguridad a tus datos, no compartas información privada de manera pública. Te hemos enviado un inbox. Saludos.
@ferfetz Hi, in order to assist you, please provide us with more information about your inquiry through private message. We will be waiting for your reply.
@kjrivas We'll be more than glad to assist you with your further requests. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.
@kjrivas We have sent you a private message. Regards.

@kjrivas Hi, in order to assist you, please send us by private message the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@BostonCarissa Hi Carissa, thanks for contacting us. In order to assist you as best we can, send us a DM with your reservation code and the full name of whom is traveling.
@BG420BG Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@JuanVal04543900 Hello, in order to help you out, please provide us by DM your reservation code and the full name of the passenger. We stay tuned.
@valerioluccio Hi, we have sent a response via DM. Regards.

@_mfrye Hi, we encourage you to submit your experience by entering the following link: https://t.co/UXdmFXGFT6, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@JaclynKarnowski Hi, we have responded to your DMs. Regards.
@k_jhaveri Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@Vivian_M_Astro Agradecemos o alerta, Vivian, e saiba que já enviamos os seus comentários para a equipe local. 
Lamentamos pelo tratamento recebido e permanecemos à disposição.

@Vivian_M_Astro [+] parceira para alerta sobre o atendimento prestado.
Permanecemos à disposição.

@Vivian_M_Astro Olá Vivian, agradecemos o alerta, mas realmente o check-in internacional é encerrado 90 minutos antes do voo. Já os nacionais são encerrados 60 minutos antes.
Lamentamos que a experiência tenha sido negativa e saiba que levamos o seu comentário para conhecimento da empresa [+]

@RodriguezManuel Hola, cuéntanos si aún podemos ayudarte, si es así, Indicanos de manera detallada tu solicitud via DM, te pedimos disculpas por la demora en darte respuesta. Quedamos atentos, saludos.
@RedRaquel Hi, we have sent you a private message. Regards.
@willanythayse Agradecemos pelo reporte, Willany. Seguimos com a denúncia por aqui e recomendamos não interagir e nem passar dados pessoais para os contatos que não sejam oficiais LATAM.
@trampet8 Hi, we've sent a DM. Regards.
@willanythayse Olá Willany, você recebeu esse comunicado com o link por email?

@jsalazarpiedrah Es posible que haya una gran demanda en la temporada que desees viajar, por lo que te recomendamos estar variando las fechas de tus viajes y ser flexibles con ello para que puedas obtener una tarifa cómoda para ti.
@dvinjc Hi, in order to assist you, please send us by private message the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@PatrickEpperPhD You should know that we are currently working on your request via DM for the privacy of your data. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

data.text: @_TR4CE We've replied via DM. Regards.
@forgetfullucyyy Hi, thank you for contacting us. Please let us know via DM if you have any specific request or requirement to be able to assist you. We will stay tuned.

@phoenixfarrah Hi, due to the high demand we are having, there may be inconveniences with our customer service line, in order to assist you, please provide us with more details of your requirement through a private message. We will be waiting for your reply.
@jsalazarpiedrah Hola, todas las tarifas se encuentran sujetas a disponibilidad y a cambios, por lo tanto a medida que la disponibilidad se va agotando el precio va aumentando. Saludos.
@AlineMa04542984 Hola, te hemos enviado un DM. Saludos.
Arrive earlier at your boarding gate, since immigration and security control times and processes are presenting high waiting times.  More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp. (4/4)
Bring the complete required documentation for health control procedures (Covid-19) on the day of your trip. (3/4)
